name: A Very Good Time Travel Game
name_original: A Very Good Time Travel Game
description:
You are a clock. With legs. And you're stuck in a time loop! Wow, well done you.

Travel through time in a side scrolling platformer and watch the lifetime of a warehouse! Or at least, one time period of a warehouse!

Yeah I definitely overscoped for this Jam, the theme of "No Going Back" is implemented as an automatically scrolling function and also theres a door at the start soo thats technically there
